app.name: HelpMe
about.title: About HelpMe
about.subtitle: Your reliable companion for emergency situations worldwide
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.description: We believe that everyone deserves quick access to emergency services, no matter where they are in the world. HelpMe provides instant access to critical emergency contact numbers across all countries, helping you stay safe and prepared.
about.features.global.title: Global Coverage
about.features.global.description: Emergency numbers for 195+ countries and territories worldwide, always up-to-date and verified.
about.features.instant.title: Instant Access
about.features.instant.description: No registration required. Search, find, and call emergency services in seconds.
about.features.multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
about.features.multilingual.description: Available in multiple languages to help you communicate effectively in any country.
about.features.mobile.title: Mobile Optimized
about.features.mobile.description: Works perfectly on all devices - phone, tablet, or desktop. Always ready when you need it.
about.howItWorks.title: How It Works
about.howItWorks.step1.title: Search Your Location
about.howItWorks.step1.description: Find your current country or destination using our search feature.
about.howItWorks.step2.title: Find Emergency Numbers
about.howItWorks.step2.description: View police, fire, and ambulance numbers for your selected location.
about.howItWorks.step3.title: Call for Help
about.howItWorks.step3.description: Tap any number to instantly call emergency services when needed.
about.disclaimer.title: Important Notice
about.disclaimer.description: This app provides emergency contact information for reference. In life-threatening situations, always call local emergency services immediately. Numbers are regularly updated but may change - verify with local authorities when possible.
about.contact.title: Get in Touch
about.contact.description: Have suggestions or found incorrect information? We'd love to hear from you.
